Load data
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Install dependencies as needed
# devtools::install_deps()
# Load packages and functions for this analysis

rm(list=ls())
# devtools::load_all(quiet = TRUE)
source("R/calc_c13_a.R")
source("R/load_climate_data_AWAP.R")
source("R/compile_and_read_AWAP_data.R")
source("R/error_checking_function.R")
source("R/load_bioclim.R")
source("R/load_worldclim.R")
source("R/plot_trait_by_dataset.R")
source("R/load_CRU_clim.R")
source("R/load_envirem.R")
source("R/load_terraclimate.R")
source("R/compile_terraclimate.R")
source("R/figure_opt_plot.R")
library(lubridate)
library(R.utils)
library(tidyverse)

# load trait data
austraits <- readRDS("data/austraits_develop.RDS")

# load woodiness data

woodiness_data <- read_csv("data/woodiness_2022.03.19.csv") %>%
  distinct(taxon_name, .keep_all = T) %>%
  select(taxon_name, plant_growth_form_recoded, woodiness_recoded)
```


```{r}
sum_no_NA <- function(x) if(all(is.na(x))) NA_integer_ else sum(x, na.rm=TRUE)
```

```{r}
#where are sites located?

location_of_sites <-
  austraits$sites %>%
  filter(site_property %in% c("longitude (deg)", "latitude (deg)")) %>%
  spread(site_property, value) %>%
  rowid_to_column("ID") %>%
  rename(latitude = `latitude (deg)`, longitude = `longitude (deg)`) %>%
  mutate_at(c("latitude", "longitude"), ~suppressWarnings(as.numeric(.x))) %>%
  drop_na(longitude, latitude)


# load map of australia (required for climate data analysis)
au_map <- raster::raster("data/australia.tif")
```

```{r}
paste("data/WC_new/", list.files("data/WC copy"), sep = "")[2] %>%
  map(extract_compile_data, data_source = "WC") %>%
  bind_rows()
```

```{r}
paste("data/envirem/", list.files("data/envirem"), sep = "")[2] %>%
  map(extract_compile_data,) %>%
  bind_rows()
```

```{r}
climate_data <- load_climate_data()
```

```{r}
library("GGally")

climate_data %>% 
  select(starts_with(c("Prec","prec")), -Prec_CV_BC) %>%
  ggpairs(upper=list(continuous = "points"), diag="blank") +
  geom_abline(slope=1, intercept=0, col="red", linetype=3, size=2)

climate_data %>% 
  select(avg_temp_WC, Temp_BC) %>%
  mutate(Temp_BC = Temp_BC/10) %>%
  ggpairs(upper=list(continuous = "points"), diag="blank") +
  geom_abline(slope=1, intercept=0, col="red", linetype=3, size=2)

climate_data %>% 
  select(starts_with("VPD")) %>%
  ggpairs(upper=list(continuous = "points"), diag="blank") +
  geom_abline(slope=1, intercept=0, col="red", linetype=3, size=2)

climate_data %>% 
  select(mean_annual_shortwave_radiation_AWAP, solar_WC) %>%
  mutate(mean_annual_shortwave_radiation_AWAP = mean_annual_shortwave_radiation_AWAP * 1000) %>%
  ggpairs(upper=list(continuous = "points"), diag="blank") +
  geom_abline(slope=1, intercept=0, col="red", linetype=3, size=2)

climate_data %>% 
  select(VPD_WC, VPD_WC_mean_t) %>%
  ggpairs(upper=list(continuous = "points"), diag="blank") +
  geom_abline(slope=1, intercept=0, col="red", linetype=3, size=2)

plot(climate_data$VPD_WC, climate_data$VPD_WC_mean_t)

climate_data %>%
  select(VP_WC, avg_temp_WC, VPD_WC, VPD_WC_mean_t, tmax_WC) %>%
  ggpairs(upper=list(continuous = "points"), diag="blank")

plot(climate_data$VPD_WC_mean_t, climate_data$vpd_terraclim)

plot(climate_data$GDD_5_envirem, climate_data$avg_temp_WC_5)

abline(0,1)
```

```{r}
traits <- austraits$traits %>%
  left_join(location_of_sites) %>%
  filter(trait_name %in% c("leaf_area","leaf_dry_mass","specific_leaf_area","leaf_N_per_dry_mass","leaf_N_per_area","ci_over_ca","wood_density","plant_height", "seed_mass", "leaf_delta13C","huber_value")) %>%
  mutate(value = as.numeric(value)) %>%
  left_join(climate_data)
```


```{r}
field_traits <- traits %>%
  filter(!(dataset_id %in% c("Ahrens_2019", "Crous_2013", "Crous_2019", "Du_2018",
                            "Du_2019", "Duan_2015", "EsperonRodriguez_2019",
                            "EsperonRodriguez_2020","Everingham_2020",
                            "Farrell_2012", "Farrell_2013", "Farrell_2017", "Firn_2019",
                            "Gallagher_2011_1", "Gallagher_2011_3","Gallagher_2012", "Gallagher_2015", 
                            "Gardiner_2019", "Geange_2017", "Geange_2020", "Ghannoum_2010","Groom_2010",
                            "Harrison_2009",
                            "Hassiotou_2009", "Huang_2015", "Jagdish_2020", "Lewis_2015",
                            "Lusk_2012", "Lusk_2014", "Moore_2019_2", "Reynolds_2018", "Roderick_1999",
                            "Roderick_2002", "Schulze_2006", "Smith_2012",
                            "Tomlinson_2013","Tomlinson_2019", "Turner_2010", "Vesk_2019",
                            "Vlasveld_2018", "Warren_2005", "Warren_2006"))) %>%
  filter(!(site_name %in% c("Currency Creek Arboretum","Currency Creek Arboretum, South Australia",
                            "Australian National University glasshouse","MU_campus",
                            "Australian National Botanic Gardens","Australian National University"))) %>%
  filter(!(dataset_id %in% c("Kooyman_2011") & trait_name == "wood_density")) %>%
  filter(!(dataset_id %in% c("Wells_2012") & trait_name %in% c("seed_mass","wood_density")))

```

We also remove all trait values which are records across multiple sites, are from the literature, expert values, or are from unknown sources

```{r}
field_traits %>%
  filter(value_type %in% c("raw_value", "site_mean", "site_max", "individual_mean") | trait_name == "plant_height") -> field_traits
```

Create a new trait dataframe to only include observations with associated latitude and longitude
```{r}
field_traits_georef <- 
  field_traits %>%
  drop_na(latitude,longitude)
```


Go through and remove families which were recorded as woody but either aren't woody or do not have a tree/shrub-like growth form, e.g. grass,sedges, palms, ferns

```{r include=FALSE}
ferns_species <-
  austraits$taxa%>%
  filter(family %in% c("Schizaeaceae", "Gleicheniaceae","Dennstaedtiaceae", "Polypodiaceae","Dicksoniaceae", "Datiscaceae"))

palm_species <-
  austraits$taxa%>%
  filter(family %in% c("Arecaceae", "Pandanaceae"))

cycad_species <-
  austraits$taxa%>%
  filter(family %in% c("Cycadaceae","Zamiaceae", "Stangeriaceae"))

graminoid_species <- 
  austraits$taxa %>%
  filter(family %in% c("Poaceae","Cyperaceae","Restionaceae"))

ginger_species <- 
  austraits$taxa %>%
  filter(family %in% c("Zingiberaceae"))

field_traits_georef %>%
  filter(!taxon_name %in% ferns_species$taxon_name) %>%
  filter(!taxon_name %in% palm_species$taxon_name)%>%
  filter(!taxon_name %in% cycad_species$taxon_name)%>%
  filter(!taxon_name %in% graminoid_species$taxon_name)%>%
```

```{r include=FALSE}
woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form %>%
```

Extract values for ci:ca ratios from delta13c using equations in Farqhuar (1989) and Wang et al. (2017)

Carbon isotope discrimination values are dervied from delta_13C $\delta ^{13}C$ using the following equation from Farqhuar (1989):

$$\Delta = \frac{\delta_a-\delta ^{13}C}{1+\delta ^{13}C/1000}$$

The ci:ca ratio $(X)$ is linked to the carbon isotope discrimination value of plant samples according the following equation:

$$X = \frac{\Delta-a}{b-a},$$
where a’ and b’ have standard values 4.4‰ and 27‰, representing the diffusional 
and biochemical components of carbon isotope discrimination, respectively (Wang et al. 2017).


``` {r}
library(stringi)

woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form %>% 
  filter(trait_name %in% c("leaf_delta13C")) %>%
  select(trait_name, value, observation_id, taxon_name,dataset_id,site_name, context_name, date, ID) %>%
  mutate(value = as.numeric(value)) %>%
  group_by(trait_name, observation_id, taxon_name, dataset_id, site_name, context_name, date, ID) %>%
  summarise(value = mean(value)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  spread(key = trait_name, value = value) -> woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_c13_data

austraits$methods %>%
  filter(trait_name == "leaf_delta13C") %>%
  filter(dataset_id %in% woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_c13_data$dataset_id) %>%
  mutate(year_start = as.numeric(gsub(".*?([0-9]+).*", "\\1", year_collected_start)), year_end = as.numeric(gsub(".*?([0-9]+).*", "\\1", year_collected_end))) %>%
  select(dataset_id, year_start, year_end) -> years_c13_data

woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_c13_data <- woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_c13_data %>%
  left_join(years_c13_data) %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(average_year = round(mean(c(year_end, year_start)))) %>%
  left_join(select(climate_data, c(latitude, longitude, ID))) %>%
  mutate(c_air = calc_c_air(average_year, latitude)) %>%
  mutate(delta_C = (c_air-leaf_delta13C)/(1+leaf_delta13C/1000))%>%
  mutate(ci_over_ca_from_c13 = (delta_C-4.4)/(27-4.4)) ->calculated_data

calculated_data %>%
  select(observation_id, taxon_name, dataset_id, site_name, context_name, date, 
         ci_over_ca_from_c13, ID) %>%
  filter(!is.na(ci_over_ca_from_c13)) %>%
  mutate(units = "unitless",
         trait_name = "ci_over_ca_from_c13",
         value = as.numeric(ci_over_ca_from_c13)) %>%
  select(-ci_over_ca_from_c13) -> ci_over_ca_calculated

ci_over_ca_calculated %>%
  filter(!is.na(value)) %>%
  mutate(units = "unitless",
         trait_name = "logit_ci_over_ca_from_c13",
         value = log(value/(1-value))) -> logit_ci_over_ca_calculated

```

```{r}
library(quantreg)


rho <- function(u,tau=.5){
  u*(tau - (u < 0))
}

calc_pseudo_r2 <- function(fit, fit_0, tau){
  V<-sum(rho(fit$residuals[,tau], fit$tau[tau]))
  V0<-sum(rho(fit_0$residuals[,tau], fit$tau[tau]))
  
  1 - V/V0
}

calc_quant_reg <- function(min_tau = 0.05, max_tau = 0.95, length.required = 50, y, x){
  
  tau_ex <- seq(min_tau, max_tau, length.out = length.required)
  
  fit <- rq(y ~ x, tau = tau_ex)
  fit_0 <- rq(y ~ 1, tau = tau_ex)

  pseudo_r_2 <- map_dbl(1:length.required, ~calc_pseudo_r2(fit, fit_0, .x))
  slope <- map_dbl(1:length.required, ~summary(fit)[[.x]]$coefficients[2,1])
  pvalue <- map_dbl(1:length.required, ~summary(fit)[[.x]]$coefficients[2,4])

  tibble(slope, pseudo_r_2, tau_ex, pvalue)
}

output <- calc_quant_reg(y = woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_climate_wide$wood_density, x = scale(log(woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_climate_wide$Prec)))


output %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = tau_ex)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = pvalue), col = "grey20") +
  geom_line(aes(y = -1*slope), linetype = "dashed") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0.05, linetype = "dotted") +
  scale_y_continuous(name = "P-value (solid)", sec.axis = sec_axis(~.*-1, name = "Slope (dashed)"), limits = c(0, 1)) +
  theme_classic() +
  xlab("Tau")

output %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = tau_ex)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = pvalue), col = "grey20") +
  geom_line(aes(y = slope), linetype = "dashed") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0.05, linetype = "dotted") +
  scale_y_continuous(name = "P-value (solid)", sec.axis = sec_axis(~., name = "Slope (dashed)")) +
  theme_classic() +
  xlab("Tau")
```

```{r}
  pivot_longer(cols = c(core_traits, leaf_delta13C), names_to = "trait_name", values_to = "trait_value") %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = -c(trait_name, trait_value), names_to = "env_name", values_to = "env_value") %>%
  drop_na(env_value, trait_value) %>%
  nest(-env_name, -trait_name)%>%
  mutate(output_5 = map(data, ~rq(trait_value ~ env_value, tau = 0.05, .x, ci = TRUE, alpha = 0.99))) %>%
  mutate(output_95 = map(data, ~rq(trait_value ~ env_value, tau = 0.95, .x, ci = TRUE, alpha = 0.99))) %>%
  mutate(p_value_anova = map2_dbl(.x = output_5, .y = output_95, ~anova(.x, .y)$table$pvalue)) %>%
  mutate(slope_sig_5 = map_chr(output_5, ~if_else((.x$coefficients[2,2] * .x$coefficients[2,3]) > 0, "sig", "non_sig"))) %>%
  mutate(slope_sig_95 = map_chr(output_95, ~if_else((.x$coefficients[2,2] * .x$coefficients[2,3]) > 0, "sig", "non_sig"))) %>%
  mutate(slope_5 = map_chr(output_5, ~if_else(sign(.x$coefficients[2,1]) == 1, "pos", "neg"))) %>%
  mutate(slope_95 = map_chr(output_95, ~if_else(sign(.x$coefficients[2,1]) == 1, "pos", "neg"))) %>%
  mutate(slope_5_value = map_dbl(output_5, ~.x$coefficients[2,1])) %>%
  mutate(slope_95_value = map_dbl(output_95, ~.x$coefficients[2,1])) %>%
  mutate(symbol = case_when(
    slope_sig_5 == "non_sig" & slope_sig_95 == "non_sig" ~ "=",
    slope_sig_5 == "non_sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "neg" & slope_95 == "neg" ~ "_\\",
    slope_sig_5 == "non_sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "neg" & slope_95 == "pos" ~ "/_",
    slope_sig_5 == "non_sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "pos" & slope_95 == "neg" ~ "_\\",
    slope_sig_5 == "non_sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "pos" & slope_95 == "pos" ~ "/_",
    slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "non_sig" & slope_5 == "neg" & slope_95 == "neg" ~ "\\-",
    slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "non_sig" & slope_5 == "neg" & slope_95 == "pos" ~ "\\-",
    slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "non_sig" & slope_5 == "pos" & slope_95 == "neg" ~ "-/",
    slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "non_sig" & slope_5 == "pos" & slope_95 == "pos" ~ "-/",
    p_value_anova > 0.01 & slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "neg" & slope_95 == "neg" ~ "\\ ",
    slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "neg" & slope_95 == "pos" ~ "<",
    slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "pos" & slope_95 == "neg" ~ ">",
    p_value_anova > 0.01 & slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "pos" & slope_95 == "pos" ~ "//",
    slope_5_value < slope_95_value & p_value_anova < 0.01 & slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "neg" & slope_95 == "neg" ~ "\\-",
    slope_5_value < slope_95_value & p_value_anova < 0.01 & slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "pos" & slope_95 == "pos" ~ "//_",
    slope_5_value > slope_95_value & p_value_anova < 0.01 & slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "neg" & slope_95 == "neg" ~ "_\\",
    slope_5_value > slope_95_value & p_value_anova < 0.01 & slope_sig_5 == "sig" & slope_sig_95 == "sig" & slope_5 == "pos" & slope_95 == "pos" ~ "-/")
) -> woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_climate_long_outputs



woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_climate_long_outputs %>%
  select(-data, -output_5, -output_95)%>% View()  
  
  mutate(slope_sig_5 = map_dbl(output_5, ~if_else(sign(summary(.x)[[2]]$coefficients[2,2]) == sign(summary(.x)[[2]]$coefficients[2,3]), "sig", "non_sig")))


                       
                       
                       
                       -> woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_climate_long_outputs
  

woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_climate_long_outputs$output[[3]]

  select(trait_name, env_name, output) %>% View()
  
woody_field_traits_georef_tree_form_climate_long_outputs %>%

         predict_5 = map(output_5, ~predict(.x))
```
